Class BmiCalculator

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class BmiCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a BMI calculator. (Program appearance and implementation - BMIJFrame.java | Test - BmiCalcTest.java)

    1.0
    Author:
    Adrián Balázs
